You\'ve been qualified for Immigration with canada
Subscribe to know the Immigration Process
If you have score points more than or equal to margin criteria in the test, please click below to get the further knowledge of the process. Qualified Subscription
f you have scored less than margin critera in the test, please click below to get the full knowledge for the qualification of the test. Un-qualified Subscription

Question 1- What is Canadian Express Entry program and how does it work? Answer: Express Entry is a newly introduced method of managing applications for the existing immigration programs, which are The Federal Skilled Workers Program (FSWP), The Federal Skilled Trade Program (FSTP) and The Canadian Experience Class Program (CEC).
Question 2- What is Canadian Express Entry program and how does it work? Answer: Express Entry is a newly introduced method of managing applications for the existing immigration programs, which are The Federal Skilled Workers Program (FSWP), The Federal Skilled Trade Program (FSTP) and The Canadian Experience Class Program (CEC).
Question 3- Which immigration programs will be covered in the Express Entry Schemes? Answer: The three programs that will be covered under this scheme will be:
The Federal Skilled Worker Program; The Federal Skilled Trades Program; The Canadian Experience Class Program. The Canadian Provincial Program
